attributes.action: ensure tax payers that all expenses by m.p.s are investigated and that charges  for fraud will  be brought to court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the government was a company all fraudulent employees would be prosecuted this is a so called democracy what is the law for the ordinary man should apply to our peers

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
